import React, { useContext, useState } from "react"; import { Navbar, Nav, Container } from "react-bootstrap"; import { AuthContext } from "./AuthContext"; import "./Header.css"; import logo from "../assets/salada_logo_3_388x.avif"; function Header() { const { isLoggedIn, logout } = useContext(AuthContext); // Consume context const [isAccountHovered, setIsAccountHovered] = useState(false); return ( <>
Shop Blog About Us Rewards Contact Find In Store
{/* Account and Cart */}
setIsAccountHovered(true)} onMouseLeave={() => setIsAccountHovered(false)} > Account {isAccountHovered && (
{isLoggedIn ? ( <> Your Account ) : ( <> Log in Register )}
)}
Cart (0)
); } export default Header;
